oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oath of allegiance of James P. Byrne, Co. K, 17th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is the oath of allegiance signed by James Polk Byrne, Co. K, 17th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. Byrne was captured at Chickamauga in September 1863. He remained in prison camp until signing his oath in May 1865 at Fort Delaware, Maryland.
